techmeme.title: Pinterest rolls out global AI labels to mark images made or edited with generative AI, adding an "AI modified" stamp, via metadata analysis and AI classifiers (Jess Weatherbed/The Verge)
Sources: CVC and Blackstone invest $2B+ in equity and debt to take a minority stake in Istanbul-based Dream Games, which makes Royal Match, valuing it at ~$5B (Financial Times)
London's Court of Appeal rules Apple must pay Optis $502M as a lump sum for using Optis' 4G patents from 2013 to 2027, overturning a 2023 High Court decision (Sam Tobin/Reuters)
Microsoft raises the prices of its Xbox Series S and X consoles, Xbox controllers, and some new Xbox games globally; the consoles are priced $80 to $100 more (Tom Warren/The Verge)
Roblox reports Q1 revenue up 29% YoY to ~$1B, Bookings up 31% YoY to ~$1.2B, above $1.11B est., and DAUs up 26% YoY to 97.8M, above 93.3M est.; RBLX jumps 8%+ (Cecilia D'Anastasio/Bloomberg)
